creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
text:
Created attachment 17030
Patch for lucene to get the xxx2index.xsl file in modules directory of their respective document type.

It seems that the patch does not include the svn move operation (only the
delete operation). Please use "svn move" if the patch is not working correctly.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: This has been fixed by the lucene resource type format.
